lines.content: Nova is a command line interface (CLI) based task management application, designed to help you
manage and organise your daily tasks efficiently.
What can I do for you?
Simply type `hi`, `hey`, or `hello` to start a conversation with Nova.
Hellooo! üòÅ Hope you're feeling good today!
Nova allows you to manage different types of tasks:
- **Deadlines** ‚Äî Tasks with a specified due date
- **Events** ‚Äî Activities with start and end dates
Gotcha! üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è I've added a new task:
Gotcha! üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è I've added a new task:
Gotcha! üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏è I've added a new task:
Lists all the current tasks in the _TaskList_.
Hey girl~ What should we do today? ü§î
Marks a specific task as complete.
Yay! I've marked this task done:
Marks a specific task as incomplete.
Okay, I've marked this task undone:
Finds and displays all tasks containing the specific keyword.
Deletes a specific task from the _TaskList_.
| `deadline`         | Adds a Deadline task                | `deadline DESCRIPTION /by DATE`                   |
| `event`            | Adds an Event task                  | `event DESCRIPTION /from START_DATE /to END_DATE` |
| `mark`             | Marks specific task as complete     | `mark INDEX`                                      |
| `unmark`           | Marks specific task as incomplete   | `unmark INDEX`                                    |
| `find`             | Finds tasks with specific keyword   | `find KEYWORD`                                    |
| `clear`            | Deletes all tasks from current list | `clear`                                           |
Nova data are saved automatically in the hard disk after any command that changes the data. \
There is no need to save manually.
* Main class for the Nova task management application.
* Coordinates the UI, storage, and task components to provide a command-line task management system.
* Constructs a new Nova application instance with the specified file path for task storage.
* @param filePath Path to the file where tasks will be stored
* Starts application and enters the main loop command.
* Displays welcome message and processes user commands until exit.
throw new NovaException("Empty command is not allowed.");
* Creates a new Nova instance with a default storage path and runs it.
* When executed, displays a goodbye message and sets the exit flag to true.
* Sets the exit flag to true to signal that the application should terminate.
* Executes the bye command by displaying a goodbye message.
* @param tasks The task list (not used in this command)
* @param ui The UI for displaying the goodbye message
* @param storage The storage (not used in this command)
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Command to clear all tasks from the task list.
* When executed, removes all tasks and updates the storage.
* Executes the clear command by removing all tasks from the task list
* and saving the empty list to storage.
* @param tasks The task list to be cleared
* @param ui The UI (not directly used in this command)
* @param storage The storage to save the updated task list
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Abstract base class for all commands in the application.
* Defines the common structure and behavior that all commands must implement.
* Flag indicating whether the application should exit after this command.
* Executes the command using the provided task list, UI, and storage.
* @param tasks The task list to operate on
* @param ui The UI for user interaction
* @param storage The storage for saving task data
* @throws NovaException If an error occurs during command execution
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws NovaException;
* Checks if the application should exit after this command.
* @return true if the application should exit, false otherwise
* Command to create a new deadline task.
* When executed, creates a deadline task with the specified name and due date,
* adds it to the task list, and updates the storage.
* Constructs a new DeadlineCommand with the specified task name and due date.
* @param taskName The name/description of the deadline task
* @param by The due date/time for the deadline
* Executes the deadline command by creating a new deadline task,
* adding it to the task list, displaying a confirmation message,
* and saving the updated task list.
* @param tasks The task list to add the deadline to
* @param ui The UI for displaying confirmation messages
* @param storage The storage to save the updated task list
* @throws NovaException If an error occurs during task creation or storage
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws NovaException {
Task deadline = new Deadline(taskName, false, ui, by);
* Command to delete a task from the task list.
* When executed, removes the task with the specified ID from the task list
* Constructs a new DeleteCommand with the specified task ID.
* @param taskId The ID of the task to delete
* Executes the delete command by removing the task with the specified ID
* from the task list and saving the updated list to storage.
* @param tasks The task list to remove the task from
* @param ui The UI (not directly used in this command)
* @param storage The storage to save the updated task list
* @throws NovaException If the task ID is invalid or an error occurs during storage
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws NovaException {

* adds it to the task list, and updates the storage.

* @param taskName The name/description of the event task
* @param from The start time/date of the event
* @param to The end time/date of the event

* and saving the updated task list.

* @param ui The UI for displaying confirmation messages
* @param storage The storage to save the updated task list
* @throws NovaException If an error occurs during task creation or storage
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws NovaException {
Task event = new Event(taskName, false, ui, from, to);
* Command to find all tasks with the specific string in their description.

public static final String FIND_TASK_MESSAGE = "Here are the matching tasks ^.^:";

"Hi!! What should we do today? o.0",

* A random greeting is chosen from a predefined set of greeting messages and printed to the UI.

* Command to mark a task as done.
* When executed, marks task with the specified ID from the task list as done

* @param ui The UI to display the task status update
* @param storage The storage to save the updated task list

* and saving the updated task list.

* @param ui The UI for displaying confirmation messages

* @throws NovaException If an error occurs during task creation or storage
public void execute(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws NovaException {
Task todo = new Todo(taskName, false, ui);
* Command to unmark a task (sets it as not done).

* from the task list and saving the updated list to storage.

public static final String ERR_INVALID_EVENT = "Please follow this format: " + "\n" +

* Parses user input commands and converts them into appropriate Command objects.
* Responsible for interpreting command syntax and handling command parameters.
* Parses a full command string and returns the appropriate Command object.
* Recognizes various command types and delegates to specialized parsing methods.
* @param fullCommand The complete command string from user input
* @return Command object corresponding to the parsed command
* @throws NovaException If the command is invalid or missing required parameters
public static Command parse(String fullCommand) throws NovaException {
* Parses mark/unmark commands which require a task number.
* @param taskName The task number as a string
* @param isMarking Whether this is a mark (true) or unmark (false) command
* @return MarkCommand or UnmarkCommand with the specified task ID
* @throws NovaException If task number is missing or invalid
private static Command parseMarkCommand(String taskName, boolean isMarking) throws NovaException {
return isMarking ? new nova.command.MarkCommand(taskId) : new nova.command.UnmarkCommand(taskId);

* Handles persistent storage operations for the Nova application.

Ui.INDENT + "So we can start a new one!";

* Constructs a new Storage instance with specified file path and UI reference.
* @param filePath Path to the file where tasks will be stored
* @param ui UI instance for displaying messages

* Creates directory if they don't exist and handles file-related exceptions.
* @return ArrayList of Task objects loaded from file
* Saves the current list of tasks to the storage file.
* @param tasks ArrayList of Task objects to save
* Converts a line from the storage file into a Task object.
* Handles different task types (Todo, Deadline, Event) based on format.
* @param line String representation of a task from the storage file
* @return Task object created from the line, or null if conversion fails
task = new Deadline(description, isDone, ui, by);
task = new Event(description, isDone, ui, from, to);
* Represents a Deadline task in the application.
* A Deadline is a task with a specified due date/time.
* Constructs a Deadline task with the specified description, status, UI reference, and due date.
* @param description The description of the task
* @param isDone The initial completion status of the task
* @param ui The UI instance for displaying messages
* @param by The due date/time for the deadline
public Deadline(String description, boolean isDone, Ui ui, String by) {
* Returns a string representation of the Deadline task.
* Prefixes the task with a [D] to indicate it is a Deadline task and appends the due date/time.
* @return A string containing the task type, status icon, description, and due date
* Returns a string formatted for saving the Deadline task to storage.
* @return A string representation of the Deadline task suitable for saving to a file
* Represents an Event task in the application.
* An Event is a task with specified start and end times.
* Constructs an Event task with the specified description, status, UI reference,
* @param description The description of the task
* @param isDone The initial completion status of the task
* @param ui The UI instance for displaying messages
* @param from The start time/date of the event
* @param to The end time/date of the event
public Event(String description, boolean isDone, Ui ui, String from, String to) {

* Prefixes the task with an [E] to indicate it is an Event task and appends the start and end times.
* @return A string containing the task type, status icon, description, and start/end times
* Returns a string formatted for saving the Event task to storage.
* @return A string representation of the Event task suitable for saving to a file

* @param isDone The initial completion status of the task

public Todo(String description, boolean isDone, Ui ui) {

* Returns a string formatted for saving the Todo task to storage.

* Manages user input, display formatting, and messaging.
